cobject::COFnWrap

cobject::COFnWrap Class Reference

A Meta IFnWrap to act as a method proxy This class sends makes a CrossObject protocol method/function/construction request based on arguements passed to it. More...

Detailed Description

A Meta IFnWrap to act as a method proxy This class sends makes a CrossObject protocol method/function/construction request based on arguements passed to it.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

bool cobject::COFnWrap::TypeCheck ( const ITypeInfo &  retType,
const ITypeInfo &  paramType 
) [virtual]

Stub for type checking.

Note:
Typechecking is not supported by this IFnWrap, so this function always returns true.
Parameters:
retType The return type to test
paramTyp The parameter tuple type to test
Returns:
true - as typechecking is not supported by this IFnWrap
